quest.name: I Have Never Exploded
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol has an appetite for destruction.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid saltpeter in the HuskDeliver the splendid saltpeter to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid mugwort in the HuskDeliver the splendid mugwort to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid magmatongue at Mjrl's TearsDeliver the splendid magmatongue to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The workers have been experiencing all manner of difficulties of late. Worst among them are the cave-ins, which lead to cracked skulls and blocked tunnels. While we're still working on a solution to the former, we at least have a plan for the latter: explosives!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a smattering of saltpeter. Any you can provide will be gratefully received!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a smattering of mugwort. Any you can provide will be gratefully received!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a magmatongue. A generous serving of fruit worms on your hook, and they'll be jumping at the chance to be caught!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The Husk is the place most likely to have what we seek, though I must warn you, it's rather a long trip from here.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The Husk is the place most likely to have what we seek, though I must warn you, it's rather a long trip from here.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: While they tend to move from place to place, a large number was seen at Mjrl's Tears recently. Perhaps that would be a suitable location to begin your search?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Do you have what I need to try my hand at making explosives?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, yes. This is just what I was looking for. Probably. Once it's been combined with grasses, saltpeter, charcoal, sulphur, and just a tiny splash of urine─not mine, I might add─we should be ready to blast through that rubble!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To be quite frank, I've not much experience in this sort of thing, but it seems like that I can eventually perfect it through trial and error. After all, what is the worst that could happen?
